title: Vadim Manzon
text:
Vadim Arkadyevich Manzon (; born 5 December 1994) is a <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n-<a href="Israel">Israel</a>i <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> for <a href="FC%20Strogino%20Moscow">FC Strogino Moscow</a> on 15 July 2013 in a game against <a href="FC%20Torpedo%20Vladimir">FC Torpedo Vladimir</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Olimpiyets%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Olimpiyets Nizhny Novgorod</a> on 15 July 2017 in a game against <a href="PFC%20Krylia%20Sovetov%20Samara">PFC Krylia Sovetov Samara</a>.
Mazon signed a three-year contract with <a href="Karlsruher%20SC">Karlsruher SC</a> on 25 July 2015.
